quotes.text: Be fearful when others are greedy, and greedy when others are fearful.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: The stock market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: If you aren't willing to own a stock for ten years, don't even think about owning it for ten minutes.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: The day you buy a stock is the day you invest, not when the market crashes.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.text: Know what you own, and know why you own it.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.text: If you can't explain why a stock should rise in 30 seconds, don't buy it.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.text: The margin of safety is the central concept of investment.
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.text: In the short run, the market is a voting machine; in the long run, it is a weighing machine.
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.text: Investment is most intelligent when it is most businesslike.
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.text: It's far better to buy a wonderful company at a fair price than a fair company at a wonderful price.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.text: Compound interest is the eighth wonder of the world. He who understands it, earns it; he who doesn't, pays it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Diversification is protection against ignorance. It makes little sense if you know what you're doing.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: Markets are always wrong. That wrongness is the opportunity.
quotes.author: George Soros

quotes.text: Bull markets are born on pessimism, grow on skepticism, mature on optimism, and die on euphoria.
quotes.author: John Templeton

quotes.text: The best investment you can make is in yourself.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: To make money, you need to know something others don't.
quotes.author: Howard Marks

quotes.text: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: It's far better to buy a wonderful company at a fair price than a fair company at a wonderful price.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett
